data.text:
@JodiDaniel I think that the boosted + negative test means that we are probably safe in the crowd unmasked.

If not this is a massive super-spreader event -- lucky there's no covid in Florida as Desantis tells us
@boltyboy I'm skipping the conferences this go around... just not quite ready to spend time with thousands of friends/strangers unmasked. Keep posting...
@boltyboy They must be the equity advocates. Be nice to them!
@TaraCivicHealth I gave up. Precisely 0.1% are wearing masks.
@boltyboy I appreciate your virtue, seriously. Thanks for signaling it.
@boltyboy Hey, you! Started out wearing my mask but now, by afternoon, I have left it behind…

@boltyboy Stay strong @boltyboy We just ran a 600+ people #digitalhealth conference with mandated rapid tests, vax and masks and it was a fab celebration. Everyone felt comfortable and the immunocompromised amongst our community were able to actively participate. #AccessEquity
@boltyboy Fascinating to watch the behavior change. Stay safe!
